body.para: Two signal control is used when two sets of input/output signals are assigned to the same group number. Two signal control is described below with an example case in which USDO1/USDI1 and USDO2/USDI2 are controlled with M581 and M583.

body.para: The timing chart below shows the operation with the following functions:

list.li: Output Signal Not Turned Off Upon Completion
